name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Wild Pitch
storyline: You gave up on sports after an accident and vowed to focus only on your studies after you transfer. But you make an impression on Si-eon Park, captain and main catcher of the baseball team. The captain keeps asking you to be a pitcher. The main pitcher is wary yet helpful. The cleanup hitter is strangely interested in you. Can you safely make it to graduation?
summary: Wild Pitch is an original maybe series romance visual novel.
